Name: 0_the_to_and_of
Representative_Docs: Our government takes great pains to prevent actions to mitigate the damages climate is causing. This is why we are facing dire conditions. Greed. Pure and simple. We will not get any help from them. So we must do what we have to survive. We have to look ahead and see where all this is leading.

As much as I have benefited of the tar sands in the construction of , in the maintenance of and pipe line here’s some information it 4 barrels of water to produce 1 barrel of oil to extract the oil the oil all the water comes from the Athabasca river all the plants run on natural gas.

It's good to see California doing the E-Bike incentive program again, we need all of the US to do the same, just as Canada should as well, sure Gas is cheaper now in Canada but we still need to get more E-Bikes on our roads or Pathways !!

Name: 2_de_la_en_le
Representative_Docs: Vamos directos al desastre. No acabo de ver claro la cifra que da de aumento de la demanda por la IA yo diría que es global pero de lo que no hay duda es que no se cumplirán ninguno de los objetivos, ni el de 2030 ni el de 2050.
L’objectif visé était de leur faire état de la mission et de l’implication de la Croix-Rouge canadienne CRC en matière de santé humaine et de changements climatiques.
De nuevo con el clima. En este momento, la temperatura en Sartenejas es de 20°C, la condición es Nublado . Que viva la universidad!
